ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: spell problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Barto, how did you map the sense heading to  your right turn key?  and does this free up hotkey space for other things?  Reason I ask this is I was taught
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Barto, how did you map the sense heading to your right turn key? and
does this free up hotkey space for other things? Reason I ask this is I was
taught by a friend to have the Hotkey for sense heading to be in the first
space next to my combat key like taunt or kick or bash depending on my
character that way I can increase sense heading skill while in combat.
----- Original Message -----

> > > What my son and I did was to map the hot key to the right turn
> > > button. Every time we turn right, we sense heading. Builds skill
> > > quickly. Can be done for foraging, as well, but you end up with
> stuff
> > > on your cursor as you run around. Not always a good thing.
> > >
> > > Barto
> > >
